description:
COURSE FULLY UPDATED at June 2nd 2016

  • Most affordable Microsoft Excel 2016 and 2013 course!

FROM BEGINNER TO EXPERT IN 4 HOURS?!?

PRICE WILL BE INCREASED TO $40 June 15th 2016

WHAT YOU WILL NEED:

A copy of Microsoft Excel 2013 or Microsoft Excel 2016.

Who is this excel course for?

This course is for anyone who wants to save $1000s of dollars going to excel masters and people who want to do it themselves. Learning excel can not only save you money but also get you a new job. Even do you're own tax sheets!

Bottom line: Learn Excel, Make Good Money or Save Good Money

This training provides you everything you need to know about Microsoft Excel.

LEARNING OBJECTIVES:

  1. Navigating around in Microsoft Excel 2013 and 2016
  2. Edit and enter data in Microsoft Excel 2013 and 2016
  3. Adjust the way data and information are displayed in Microsoft Excel 2013 and 2016
  4. Learn how to write formulas quickly and easily in Microsoft Excel 2013 and 2016
  5. The point-and-click method in Microsoft Excel 2013 and 2016
  6. Represent your data with charts and graphs in Microsoft Excel 2013 and 2016
  7. Microsoft Excel 2013 tools like sorting, sub totals, and filtering
  8. Freeze columns and rows in Microsoft Excel 2013 and 2016
  9. Freeze panes in Microsoft Excel 2013 and 2016
  10. Remove duplicates from data in Microsoft Excel 2013 and 2016
  11. Use printing and sharing in Microsoft Excel 2013 and 2016
  12. AND MUCH MUCH MORE!


The excel course is separated into 3 sections:

  1. INTRODUCTION TO EXCEL: Students will learn the basics of excel and create and move around the worksheet, this section is mainly for familiarity and to help guide students to success in Microsoft Excel!
  2. Formulas and Functions in Excel:This section of the course will get students to work harder in excel using different functions that will make using excel easier when working with lots of data in a worksheet!
  3. Tables in Excel: This section of the course will get students confident with Tables in excel! This section will make students table masters of excel.

DON'T WAIT! SIGN UP ASAP TO LEARN THE NEWEST TIPS AND TRICKS ABOUT EXCEL!
title: Microsoft Excel 2013 - Master it!
